item.title: Build native mobile packages from HTML/CSS/JS with PhoneGap Build API
item.description: Note: PhoneGap and PhoneGap Build are going to be shut down Goal Convert an HTML/CSS/JS web app into a native Android APK using PhoneGap Build cloud service. Setup Create an account at https://build.phonegap.com/ Create config file Add config.xml to your app root folder: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <widget xmlns = "http://www.w3.org/ns/widgets" xmlns:gap = "http://phonegap.com/ns/1.0" id = "com.bustroker.notes" versionCode = "10" version = "1.0.0" > <name>Bustroker Notes</name> <description> Personal memorandum. </description> <author href="https://www.
